meanings.sent1: The soapless hands felt rough and dry.
meanings.sent2: She washed the dishes with soapless water.
meanings.sent3: The soapless bathroom was a reminder to buy more soap.
meanings.sent4: His soapless car wash left streaks on the windows.
meanings.sent5: The soapless laundry smelled musty and unwashed.

meanings.sent1: The soapless shower gel was not effective.
meanings.sent2: They cleaned the floor with a soapless solution.
meanings.sent3: The soapless sink made washing hands a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her soapless shampoo left her hair greasy.
meanings.sent5: The soapless bath left a residue on the skin.
